summary: P70 Paid Listing + Campaign Item listing_type - All features verified. Backend 100% (15/15 tests), Frontend tabs/routes/modals working.

issues: Console hydration warnings: '<tr> cannot be a child of <span>', '<span> cannot be a child of <tbody>' - caused by React DevTools or Emergent wrapper spans. Not blocking functionality.

critical_code_review_comments: POST /api/admin/listings/{id}/doping now supports paid doping_type with duration_days
doping_type filter (free/paid/showcase/urgent) works on admin listings endpoint
doping_counts returns all 4 types with proper counts
PricingCampaignItem model has listing_type field (free/paid/urgent/showcase) - working correctly
Campaign item CRUD endpoints (POST/PUT/GET/DELETE) handle listing_type properly
Individual and corporate scopes both support all 4 listing types
Type summary badges show quota totals per listing_type in both AdminPricingTiers and AdminPricingPackages
All 5 doping tabs visible on admin listings page (Tümü, Ücretsiz İlan, Ücretli İlan, Vitrin İlan, Acil İlan)
seed_data_creation: Campaign items created during testing were cleaned up
context_for_next_testing_agent: P70 Paid Listing + Campaign Type fully operational. Backend: POST doping with paid type sets paid_until, listings filter by doping_type=paid works, campaign items support 4 listing_types. Frontend: All 5 doping tabs with counts, paid routes (/admin/listings/paid, /admin/individual-listing-applications/paid, /admin/corporate-listing-applications/paid) work, campaign modal has 4-option listing_type select.

listings_doping_counts_structure.description: doping_counts includes free, paid, showcase, urgent keys

admin_listings_paid_tab.description: Ücretli İlan tab visible with count on admin listings page

pricing_tiers_type_summary.description: Type summary badges show totals per listing_type (e.g., Ücretsiz: 16, Ücretli: 30)

pricing_packages_listing_type.description: Corporate campaign items support listing_type field

sidebar_paid_links.description: Sidebar has 3 new paid links: Ücretli İlanlar, Bireysel Ücretli İlan, Kurumsal Ücretli İlan
